an4.128:1.1: “Tathagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammasambuddhassa patubhava cattaro acchariya abbhuta dhamma patubhavanti.
an4.128:1.4: sa tathagatena analaye dhamme desiyamane sussusati sotam odahati anna cittam upatthapeti.
an4.128:1.5: Tathagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammasambuddhassa patubhava ayam pathamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo patubhavati.
an4.128:2.2: Sa tathagatena manavinaye dhamme desiyamane sussusati sotam odahati anna cittam upatthapeti.
an4.128:2.3: Tathagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammasambuddhassa patubhava ayam dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo patubhavati.
an4.128:3.2: Sa tathagatena opasamike dhamme desiyamane sussusati sotam odahati anna cittam upatthapeti.
an4.128:3.3: Tathagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammasambuddhassa patubhava ayam tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo patubhavati.
an4.128:4.2: Sa tathagatena avijjavinaye dhamme desiyamane sussusati sotam odahati anna cittam upatthapeti.
an4.128:4.3: Tathagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammasambuddhassa patubhava ayam catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo patubhavati.
an4.128:4.4: Tathagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammasambuddhassa patubhava ime cattaro acchariya abbhuta dhamma patubhavanti”ti.
